offers: We offer you help in the field

home.welcome_msg: is a response to the needs of foreigners who want to find their place in a new country more efficiently and quickly.

mission.title: LEGALISE mission
mission.about: The need to share knowledge, experience and the willingness to help are the main reasons why this activity was established. LEGALISE is an alternative to unreliable advisors, unregistered companies and "lawyers" who suddenly stop answering phone calls and leave their clients "to fend for themselves". Looking for someone who has experience and at the same time a partner-like and honest approach to the client? Have a problem or doubts? Speak up - together we will find the best possible solution.

reviews.name: Natalia Zalewska
reviews.text: Full professed !!! Nice, specific service and very professional. Great prices, I recommend it !!!

reviews.name: Olena Novakov
reviews.text: The answer to my question was 100% exhaustive. I really like "that if any further questions arise, they can be asked for no extra charge." I will definitely use this website whenever I need help. Additionally, responses are provided very quickly

reviews.name: Albert Andrzejewski
reviews.text: I recommend it to everyone !!!! Fantastic service: fast and professional. Thank you with all my heart on behalf of myself and my wife. I wish you all the best.

reviews.name: Oktawian Walczak
reviews.text: Very professional, competent service. The service was performed quickly and at the highest level at a good price! I recommend it!

reviews.name: Klaudia Wi≈õniewska
reviews.text: I received the answer to my question very quickly. Immediately after sending the follow-up question. The answer fully satisfied me. She was concrete and professional, supported by the law. If I have any legal problems in the future, I will definitely use this portal.

reviews.name: Marian Krupa
reviews.text: Super professional and responsible work, everything is done competently and quickly! 5 +++
